overview:
Steve Freeman is responsible for all Global sales for Vovici, bringing over 13 successful years of selling and team development to his role. Freeman oversees all aspects of enterprise and mid-market sales, and well as the development of business relationships with market research firms and strategic partners.

Prior to joining Vovici, Freeman was responsible for North America Sales for Endeca Technologies where he drove over 200% revenue growth in two years. Before Endeca, Freeman was head of Worldwide Sales for Above All Software where he took the company from five customers to over 45 in six quarters. Prior to joining Above All Freeman was responsible for building and developing the North American Reseller Channel and General Business sales team for Business Objects.
